meanings.definition: A Hungarian dish made with meat, onions, and paprika.
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes delicious paprikash for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional paprikash with a side of rice.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled paprikash on my shirt while eating.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of paprikash filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The rich red color of the paprikash made it look appetizing.

meanings.definition: To cook or season with paprika.
meanings.sent1: I paprikash my chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent2: She loves to paprikash her potatoes for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: He paprikashes everything, even his morning eggs!
meanings.sent4: The chef carefully paprikashed the dish, adding a burst of color.
meanings.sent5: Paprikashing the stew gave it a unique taste that everyone enjoyed.
